website_summaries.verdict: If money isn't an issue, the Toshiba Excite 7.7 is a compact tablet with a beautiful display and impressive internal speeds.
pros: The Toshiba Excite 7.7 has a great AMOLED screen, a snappy quad-core processor, and ships natively with Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich
cons: At $500 the Excite 7.7's sticker price is steep, the front camera is awkwardly placed, and there is no HDMI support

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality tablet
customer_reviews.text: Pros made of aluminum not plastic beautiful screen, colour and contrast, best screen ever made maybe? unscratchable Glass screen excellent internal hardware Tegra 3 Cons , not the best to read in sunlight. Saving apps to local 16gb storage without option of saving to SD Not the tablets fault but there is no online forum presence for these models, which is helpful for hacks and tweaks and updates. Not many choices in cases , doesnt fit into common 7" cases Overall the best tablet money can buy
customer_reviews.author: Nowhereman

customer_reviews.title: do not waste yor money
customer_reviews.text: very hard to connect to wifi plus letters from the previous screen were superimposed on the next screen
customer_reviews.author: Loren Swift

customer_reviews.title: I love my tablet
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this tablet cuz nobody I knew had one, but it's Toshiba so I gave it a shot. It is well worth it. I've had no problems with it so far, an doubt I will. Everything on it looks so bright an clear. Picture quality is wonderful, so is video. Volume is a little quiet but not too bad. I would recommend this tablet to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: babybooyah

customer_reviews.title: good tablet but sooooo many bugs
customer_reviews.text: this a really great tablet, when it works.when I first got it, it was great, it was lightning fast, incredible display, and lots of apps. But now that I have owned it for a few months,I realize that it really isn't that great at all. That speed which it once had, has now been replaced with freezing, glitches and bugs. I really like this tablet, but not for the price that I payed for it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L.

customer_reviews.title: arrived on Time.
customer_reviews.text: Tablet worked as expected. Tablet has OLED screen which is amazing, beautiful colors. Has features I was looking for, it accepts mico SD flash (so far tested with 64 gig and working, needs to be formatted exfat, or fat32), accepts OTG (excellent feature to have, I was happy that it works with a card reader) Just wish Toshiba would update the OS to current version. So far most excellent Tablet.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: What can I say... awesome unit.
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I got this! The screen is just amazing, especially when compared to the screens on other units. It is fast, slick and responsive. The only draw back, is Toshiba is not keeping up with updates. And some things like MAXGO won't run on it.
customer_reviews.author: R. B.

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba Excite 7.7
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is great with it slim metallic casing and brilliant AMOLED display, light and easy to hold. It came with Android Ice Cream Sandwich 4.0 but it received the OTA upgrade immediately. Still have not upgraded to Jelly Bean yet, considering the fact that Flash will not be supported. Other than that, the device is great looking, fast and smooth.Charger cable is thick unweildy and proprietary. Will look for a dock to check out the HDMI output.
customer_reviews.author: Lewistar

customer_reviews.title: Terrific tablet!
customer_reviews.text: The display is incredible, the feel and finish are outstanding and it's a blast to use. The ability to accept MicroSD cards (which was a major driver in my choice) makes it easy to load up several different movie/music/whatever mixes and swap them as needed.
customer_reviews.author: digitbrat

customer_reviews.title: Tried 2 of these tablets, both defectives
customer_reviews.text: I can not recommend this tablet. Fist tablet had dead battery a could not have been charged. Second tablet did not worked at all. 5 stars to Amazon for painless returns.
customer_reviews.author: ON

customer_reviews.title: Great cell phone companion.
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit pricey but the screen is beautiful. FIts easily in a smaller purse and is very light. It is a great companion to your cell phone. Fast quad core great for browsing the web/watching a movie or just reading.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hera

customer_reviews.title: great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several tablets prior to the excite and none performed as well as this. The colors in the graphics are very vivid. I love the swype keyboard as well as the ability to type in different languages. The tablet is worth every penny even though it has been discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: witchy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life, great screen. Whats really nice is the ability to plug in flash drives with a $2.99 cord.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D.

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 5 stars but the tablets had some issues with charging and the wall unit stopped working but i can still charge the unit through any usb port.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Wade

customer_reviews.title: Liked the camera and the fact that it has a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for work. Liked the camera and the fact that it has a flash. Good quality screen and overall good quality.
customer_reviews.author: John Hoaby

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has the greatest screen! Just as good as iPad's! Great size to take everywhere plus SD card slot! And the best Bonus is, it was just upgraded to Jellybean! Very happy with this tablet! Jen
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schneider

customer_reviews.title: My new tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the tablet. Perfect screen size and flawless processor. the only thing I don't like about the it is the battery life(4-5 hours).
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: Obviously I am quite happy with the one I have owned for around two ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second identical Toshiba, now purchsed for my wife. Obviously I am quite happy with the one I have owned for around two years already. This 2nd. one is also working quite well and giving a brilliant picture. The only shortcoming is (was - now not really needed) that there is no HDMI out on this particular model. This requirement is now more or less redundant as I am now using CHROMECAST to cast to my tv or projector from the Toshiba.
customer_reviews.author: desw

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: for the short time I had this tablet I truly loved it. The colors and screen clarity were marvelous. Sadly it was stolen from me so I guess someone else liked it as much as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very, very, slow
customer_reviews.text: Takes 10 to 30 seconds to load a page. If you Google this problem you see lots of complaints. I just turned it off for the last time never to turn it back on. Very frustrating to use. Toshiba and seller have been no help at all. After reloading back to factory software several times I am giving up. This was a very expensive mistake. Should have bought an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M Springer Sr

customer_reviews.title: Fast, cheap, and good
customer_reviews.text: Came 2 business days after ordered when played for standard. Came in box with everything as promised for half the original price and so far, it works good. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hadee

customer_reviews.title: the tablet suddenly died after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the tablet while it was working. A few days ago it suddenly didn't power on anymore. I contacted Toshiba to send item in for repair and I discovered that they do not provide free shipping under factory warranty, you have to pay for the $25 prepaid box yourself. Quite disappointing to spend $500 on a device and then spend another $25 to send it in for repair under factory warranty! That is when all the other manufacturers I had to deal with send you the prepaid box for free. Amazon was kind to compensate me for that, however beware of Toshiba. So 5* to Amazon, one star to Toshiba.
customer_reviews.author: elena

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic tv tc pst 55
customer_reviews.text: It was to buggy but the screen was great to look at I was looking at your Panasonic tv model tc pst 55 but I can't find it.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Burks

customer_reviews.title: A compact tablet with beautiful display
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet mainly because of its AMOLED display. Currently, this is the largest AMOLED tablet available(there is Samsung Galaxy tab 7.7 but more expensive). Out of the box, web browsing was very slow and unresponsive. It was almost unusable. However, after I disabled "javascript" and "plugins" in the browser setting, it became very fast and responsive. I also got a docking station but returned it immediately. If I charged the tablet through the dock, I needed to reboot the tablet every time and the battery drained from 100% to say 80% in a few minutes. Maybe I got a defective docking station but I can do without it. Overall, I am very satisfied with this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: Simply the BEST TABLET!
customer_reviews.text: Toshiba does a GREAT job in making their products stand out in looks and performance. This is super-fast and good looking tablet. The only things that's bit annoying is the charging port as its not regular micro-USB, but I have no complains. I would highly recommend this tablet, its worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This amazing tablet from Toshiba offers tantalizing features for gamers, but its too expensive for casual users. Pros: 1. Excellent graphics 2. Android ICS 3. Thin and light design Cons: 1. Expensive
customer_reviews.author: Sniper21

customer_reviews.title: Pure and excellent design...
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest 8" android tablet out there by leaps and bounds. The finish itself is is unparalleled. When Toshiba came out with this tablet no one wanted 8" tablets. Now 8" is the most desired size.
customer_reviews.author: Quasitraveler

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I won't rewrite all the pros and cons that have already been said, I will just say that this is a great tablet and with the upgrade to 4.1 Jelly Bean, it is even better. Screen sensitivity to touch is amazing. I sometimes don't even feel myself touching the screen and it has already reacted. I happened to catch a deal that I guess must have been a clearance at HHxxxGG. Bought 2 @ 199.99ea. VERY HAPPY!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Romano

customer_reviews.title: simply perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everything works so smoothly. Very fast and the screen is crisp and vibrant. Is only about 1/4" thick but has a solid feel in the hand with nice weight. I bought the 16gb internal memory and a class 10 32 gb micro SD card for my music. I saw a dock with usb's and HDMI was just released so I'll get that too. The voice recognition makes text input a breeze. I bought this after using my wife's 10" Thrive for 7 months, which works well also.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarchitect

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME 7.7
customer_reviews.text: This tablet... is the best tablet out there bar none!!!!!!!!!! the screen is incredible !!! everything else looks like mud !!!!!..... for the life of me I dont know why Toshiba ..does not advertise this tablet !! and i got a killer deal on 2 of these on newegg. for 329 each free shipping... well there all gone lol
customer_reviews.author: toofee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is pretty good, but there are flaws. For the price, it has a cheap terrible camera, and it doesn't have hdmi either. So for $500 your really not getting anything better than the nexus 7 tablet which costs about half what this costs. The price of this doesn't make any sense, especially when the 10.1 model goes for $349.
customer_reviews.author: Irad

customer_reviews.title: Warning:Toshiba will not unlock the bootloader..
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** THIS TABLET IS DISCONTINUED..MEANING NO FUTURE SUPPORT..THANKS TO-SHIT-BAD...FOR SCREWING YOUR CUSTOMERS Toshiba has broken the Android Open platfom policy. If I want to root and void my warranty, then its my decision not them. Toshiba will not support rooting your device, meaning you will not be able to unlock the bootloader and root it..This is a very bad decision on them..This tablet will die in a few months...I was about to get it until I read this...BAD BAD DECISION.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Diaz

product_meta.title: Toshiba Excite AT275T32 7.7-Inch Tablet (Black)
product_meta.description:
